name: Ocean Drive
description:
Movement is handled by the ARROW KEYS

The SPACEBAR is used to interact with the game.

A game about caring for a loved one. You drive along a road, occasionally The game becomes about choosing between exploring the story or completing the game.

The game continues to loop until a game over screen is reached, I did this to portray how caring for an ill loved one can potentially be a lifelong struggle.

Objects at stops that glow yellow can be interacted with and are used to explore the story.

made for the Nar8 Jam

---------------------------------------------------------------------

Featured on Warp Door's Pocket Dimensions - Insides Out

"It's touching and relatable while being quite poetic in form. How it all unfolds is quite brilliant, actually -- constantly keeping you chasing answers."
- Warp Door

---------------------------------------------------------------------
